title: Lipschitz Modulus of Convex Functions via Function Values
authors: Pham Duy Khanh, Vu Vinh Huy Khoa, Vo Thanh Phat, Le Duc Viet
abstract:
In this note, we establish the Lipschitz continuity of finite-dimensional
globally convex functions on all given balls and global Lipschitz continuity
for eligible functions of that type. The Lipschitz constants in both situations
draw information solely from function values, and the global Lipschitz modulus
is found when it exists. Some examples of classes of globally Lipschitz
continuous convex functions beside the norms are also provided along with their
global Lipschitz modulus.
